item.title: Getting started with PyCharm
item.description: Installation or Setup # There are two PyCharm editions: Community and Professional. Both are downloadable from JetBrains website. Additionally, there is another edition, PyCharm Edu. JetBrains recommend this edition, if you are learning or teaching Programming with Python. The supported platforms are Windows, Linux and macOS. To install PyCharm on: Windows: Run the .exe file and follow the instructions of PyCharm Setup wizard Linux: Unpack the .tar.gz archive into any directory within your home directory OS X: Open the .
